content: j-t-r is a pattern for a set of easy to knit beginner friendly wrist warmers the pattern comes in three different sizes * child * teen/small-to-medium adult * large/extra-large adult to make the process as smooth as possible for absolute beginners i filmed a complete tutorial on how to knit this pattern you can find it here https //youtu be/u9deyap_1lk to knit the j-t-r pattern you need 25-50 grams of fingering weight yarn and a set of us 2 2 75 mm double pointed needles _______ a huge thank you to einfachnora who translated this pattern into german
